text.value:
UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = SYSUTCDATETIME()
FROM dbo.DimPolicy dim
JOIN stg.Policy stg 
    ON dim.PolicyId = stg.PolicyId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Number, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Number, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PolicySegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicySegmentId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PolicyType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicyTypeId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.RefundType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.RefundProtocol, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.PremiumFrequency, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PremiumFrequencyID, '')
  );

  
INSERT INTO dbo.DimPolicy (
    PolicyId,
    Name,
    Number,
    PolicySegment,
    PolicyType,
    RefundType,
    PremiumFrequency,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.PolicyId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Number,
    stg.PolicySegmentId,
    stg.PolicyTypeId,
    stg.RefundProtocol,
    stg.PremiumFrequencyId,
    stg.CreatedOn,       -- ðŸ‘ˆ Use source-created date as ValidFrom
    NULL,                -- ValidTo open
    1,                   -- IsActive
    SYSUTCDATETIME()     -- LoadDate (when loaded into warehouse)
FROM stg.Policy stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimPolicy dim 
    ON dim.PolicyId = stg.PolicyId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.PolicyId IS NULL
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Number, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Number, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PolicySegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicySegmentId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PolicyType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PolicyTypeId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.RefundType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.RefundProtocol, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.PremiumFrequency, '') <> ISNULL(stg.PremiumFrequencyId, '')
    );

UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimCarrier dim
JOIN stg.Carrier stg 
    ON dim.CarrierId = stg.CarrierId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.CustomerCareEmail, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CustomerCareEmail, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1)
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimCarrier (
    CarrierId,
    Name,
    Code,
    CustomerCareEmail,
    AddressId,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.CarrierId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Code,
    stg.CustomerCareEmail,
    stg.AddressId,
    CreatedOn,  -- ValidFrom = ETL load time (or use source.CreatedOn if available)
    NULL,               -- ValidTo open for active records
    1,                  -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()    -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Carrier stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimCarrier dim 
    ON dim.CarrierId = stg.CarrierId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.CarrierId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.CustomerCareEmail, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CustomerCareEmail, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1)
    );

UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimClient dim
JOIN stg.Client stg 
    ON dim.ClientId = stg.ClientId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ClientSegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientSegmentId, '') OR  -- Compare NAMES, not IDs!
      ISNULL(dim.Industry, '') <> ISNULL(stg.IndustryId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ClientType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientTypeId, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.SalesPerson, '') <> ISNULL(stg.SalesPerson, '')
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimClient (
    ClientId,
    Name,
    Code,
    ClientSegment,
    Industry,
    ClientType,
    SalesPerson,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.ClientId,
    stg.Name,
    stg.Code,
    stg.ClientSegmentId,
    stg.IndustryId,
    stg.ClientTypeId,
    stg.SalesPerson,
    stg.CreatedOn,  -- Use source.CreatedOn if available
    NULL,               -- ValidTo = NULL for active records
    1,                  -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()    -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Client stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimClient dim 
    ON dim.ClientId = stg.ClientId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.ClientId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Name, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Name, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Code, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Code, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ClientSegment, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientSegmentId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Industry, '') <> ISNULL(stg.IndustryId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ClientType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.ClientTypeId, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.SalesPerson, '') <> ISNULL(stg.SalesPerson, '')
    );

-- STEP 1: Expire outdated records
UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimMember dim
JOIN stg.Member stg 
    ON dim.MemberId = stg.MemberId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
      ISNULL(dim.Email, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Email, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.DOB, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.DOB, '1900-01-01') OR
      ISNULL(dim.ParentMemberId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.ParentMemberId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.DependantType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.DependantType, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.Gender, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Gender, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.MaritalStatus, '') <> ISNULL(stg.MaritalStatus, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.NationalityId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.NationalityId, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.BasicSalary, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.BasicSalary, -1) OR
      ISNULL(dim.CostCenter, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CostCenter, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.JobGrade, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobGrade, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.JobPosition, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobPosition, '') OR
      ISNULL(dim.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01')
  );

-- STEP 2: Insert new/updated records
INSERT INTO dbo.DimMember (
    MemberId,
    FullName,
    Email,
    DOB,
    ParentMemberId,
    DependantType,
    Gender,
    MaritalStatus,
    AddressId,
    NationalityId,
    BasicSalary,
    CostCenter,
    JobGrade,
    JobPosition,
    EmploymentDate,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.MemberId,
	TRIM(
        CONCAT_WS(' ', 
            NULLIF(TRIM(FirstName), ''),
            NULLIF(TRIM(MiddleName), ''),
            NULLIF(TRIM(LastName), '')
        )
    ) AS FullName,
    stg.Email,
    stg.DOB,
    stg.ParentMemberId,
    stg.DependantType,
    stg.Gender,
    stg.MaritalStatus,
    stg.AddressId,
    stg.NationalityId,
    stg.BasicSalary,
    stg.CostCenter,
    stg.JobGrade,
    stg.JobPosition,
    stg.EmploymentDate,
    stg.CreatedDate,       -- Use source.CreatedDate as ValidFrom
    NULL,                  -- ValidTo = NULL for active records
    1,                     -- IsActive
    GETUTCDATE()       -- LoadDate
FROM stg.Member stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimMember dim 
    ON dim.MemberId = stg.MemberId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.MemberId IS NULL  -- New records
   OR (
        ISNULL(dim.Email, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Email, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.DOB, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.DOB, '1900-01-01') OR
        ISNULL(dim.ParentMemberId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.ParentMemberId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.DependantType, '') <> ISNULL(stg.DependantType, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.Gender, '') <> ISNULL(stg.Gender, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.MaritalStatus, '') <> ISNULL(stg.MaritalStatus, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.AddressId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.AddressId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.NationalityId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.NationalityId, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.BasicSalary, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.BasicSalary, -1) OR
        ISNULL(dim.CostCenter, '') <> ISNULL(stg.CostCenter, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.JobGrade, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobGrade, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.JobPosition, '') <> ISNULL(stg.JobPosition, '') OR
        ISNULL(dim.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01') <> ISNULL(stg.EmploymentDate, '1900-01-01')
    );

UPDATE dim
SET 
    IsActive = 0,
    ValidTo = GETUTCDATE()
FROM dbo.DimPolicyRenewal dim
JOIN stg.PolicyRenewal stg
    ON dim.DestinationPolicyId = stg.DestinationPolicyId
WHERE dim.IsActive = 1
  AND (
       ISNULL(dim.SourcePolicyId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.SourcePolicyId, -1) OR
       ISNULL(dim.RenewalStatus, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.RenewalStatus, -1)
  );


INSERT INTO dbo.DimPolicyRenewal (
    DestinationPolicyId,
    SourcePolicyId,
    RenewalStatus,
    ValidFrom,
    ValidTo,
    IsActive,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT
    stg.DestinationPolicyId,
    stg.SourcePolicyId,
    stg.RenewalStatus,
    stg.CreatedOn AS ValidFrom,
    NULL AS ValidTo,
    1 AS IsActive,
    GETUTCDATE() AS LoadDate
FROM stg.PolicyRenewal stg
LEFT JOIN dbo.DimPolicyRenewal dim
    ON stg.DestinationPolicyId = dim.DestinationPolicyId AND dim.IsActive = 1
WHERE dim.DestinationPolicyId IS NULL
   OR (
       ISNULL(dim.SourcePolicyId, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.SourcePolicyId, -1) OR
       ISNULL(dim.RenewalStatus, -1) <> ISNULL(stg.RenewalStatus, -1)
   );

INSERT INTO dbo.FactWorkflow (
    WorkflowId,
    MemberSK,
    PolicySK,
    CreatedOn,
    LoadDate,
    WorkflowTypeId
)
SELECT
    stag.WorkflowId,
    member.DimMemberSK,
    policy.DimPolicySK,
    stag.CreatedOn,
    GETUTCDATE(),
    stag.WorkflowTypeId
FROM (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        w.WorkflowId,
        mwl.MemberId,
        mwl.PolicyId,
        w.CreatedOn,
        w.WorkflowTypeId
    FROM stg.Workflow w
    LEFT JOIN stg.MemberWorkflowLog mwl ON w.WorkflowId = mwl.WorkflowId
    LEFT JOIN stg.Policy p ON p.PolicyId = mwl.PolicyId
) stag

-- Match Member at point-in-time
JOIN dbo.DimMember member 
    ON stag.MemberId = member.MemberId 
    AND stag.CreatedOn BETWEEN member.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(member.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND member.IsActive = 1

-- Match Policy at point-in-time
JOIN dbo.DimPolicy policy 
    ON stag.PolicyId = policy.PolicyId 
    AND stag.CreatedOn BETWEEN policy.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(policy.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND policy.IsActive = 1

-- Prevent duplicates
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM dbo.FactWorkflow f 
    WHERE f.WorkflowId = stag.WorkflowId
);

INSERT INTO dbo.FactMedicalClaim (
    MedicalClaimId,
    MemberSK,
    InsurerClaimNumber,
    InternalClaimNumber,
    AmountClaimed,
    PaymentTypeId,
    AmountSettled,
    DateReceived,
    MedicalClaimStatusId,
    AmountReAssessed,
    SettlementDate,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT 
    stg.MedicalClaimId,
    dm.DimMemberSK,
    stg.InsurerClaimNumber,
    stg.InternalClaimNumber,
    stg.AmountClaimed,
    stg.PaymentTypeId,
    stg.AmountSettled,
    stg.DateReceived,
    stg.MedicalClaimStatusId,
    stg.AmountReAssessed,
    stg.SettlementDate,
    GETUTCDATE()
FROM stg.MedicalClaim stg
JOIN dbo.DimMember dm
    ON stg.MemberId = dm.MemberId 
    AND stg.DateReceived BETWEEN dm.ValidFrom AND ISNULL(dm.ValidTo, '9999-12-31')
    AND dm.IsActive = 1
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1 
    FROM dbo.FactMedicalClaim fc 
    WHERE fc.MedicalClaimId = stg.MedicalClaimId
);

INSERT INTO dbo.FactPolicy (
    PolicySK,
    ClientSK,
    CarrierSK,
    Country,
    CategoryName,
    Product,
    BaseCurrencyName,
    Premium,
    Commission,
    Fee,
    ClientFee,
    MembersCount,
    ActiveMembers,
    ActiveEmployees,
    TotalBasmahFee,
    PolicyStartDate,
    PolicyEndDate,
    CommissionPercent,
    LoadDate
)
SELECT 
    p.DimPolicySK AS PolicyId,
    client.DimClientSK,
    carrier.DimCarrierSK,
    sp.Country,
    sp.CategoryName,
    sp.Product,
    sp.BaseCurrencyName,
    sp.Premium,
    sp.Commission,
    sp.Fee,
    sp.ClientFee,
    sp.MembersCount,
    sp.ActiveMembers,
    sp.ActiveEmployes,
    sp.TotalBasmahFee,
    sp.PolicyStartDate,
    sp.PolicyEndDate,
    sp.CommissionPercent,
    GETUTCDATE() AS LoadDate

FROM stg.spPolicy sp
JOIN stg.Policy pol ON sp.PolicyId = pol.PolicyId
JOIN dbo.DimPolicy p ON sp.PolicyId = p.PolicyId
JOIN dbo.DimClient client ON pol.ClientId = client.ClientId AND client.IsActive = 1
JOIN dbo.DimCarrier carrier ON pol.CarrierId = carrier.CarrierId AND carrier.IsActive = 1

-- Only insert if no matching row with same data exists
WHERE NOT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM dbo.FactPolicy fp
    WHERE fp.PolicySK = p.DimPolicySK
      AND ISNULL(fp.ClientSK, -1) = ISNULL(client.DimClientSK, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.CarrierSK, -1) = ISNULL(carrier.DimCarrierSK, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Country, '') = ISNULL(sp.Country, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.CategoryName, '') = ISNULL(sp.CategoryName, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.Product, '') = ISNULL(sp.Product, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.BaseCurrencyName, '') = ISNULL(sp.BaseCurrencyName, '')
      AND ISNULL(fp.Premium, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Premium, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Commission, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Commission, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.Fee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.Fee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ClientFee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ClientFee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.MembersCount, -1) = ISNULL(sp.MembersCount, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ActiveMembers, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ActiveMembers, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.ActiveEmployees, -1) = ISNULL(sp.ActiveEmployes, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.TotalBasmahFee, -1) = ISNULL(sp.TotalBasmahFee, -1)
      AND ISNULL(fp.PolicyStartDate, '1900-01-01') = ISNULL(sp.PolicyStartDate, '1900-01-01')
      AND ISNULL(fp.PolicyEndDate, '1900-01-01') = ISNULL(sp.PolicyEndDate, '1900-01-01')
      AND ISNULL(fp.CommissionPercent, -1) = ISNULL(sp.CommissionPercent, -1)
);

@concat(
  'UPDATE dbo.IncrementalLoadMetadata SET LastLoadedValue = (SELECT MAX(', 
  item().IncrementalColumn, 
  ') FROM ', 
  item().TableName,
  ') WHERE TableName = ''', 
  item().TableName, 
  ''''
)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat(
    'SELECT * FROM [',
    item().TableName,
    '] WHERE CreatedOn > ''',
    item().LastLoadTime,
    ''' OR UpdatedOn > ''',
    item().LastLoadTime,
    ''''
)

text.value:
UPDATE stg.etlControl
SET LastLoadTime = GETUTCDATE()
WHERE TableName = '@{item().TableName}'

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('stg.spPolicy', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    TRUNCATE TABLE stg.TransactionSLA;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE 
    @responsibleSysRole   INT         = NULL,        -- pass in the userâ€™s role or NULL
    @todaysDate           DATETIME    = GETDATE(),   -- or pass in your â€œtodayâ€™s Dateâ€
    @DefaultFirstFollowUp INT         = 4,          
    @DefaultSecondFollowUp INT        = 6,          
    @HRRoleValue          INT         = 2,           
    @BrokerRoleValue      INT         = 3;           

SELECT
    wf.WorkflowId,
    wf.SubmittedOn,
    wf.CompletedOn,
    COALESCE(psla.FirstFollowUp,
             csla.FirstFollowUp,
             @DefaultFirstFollowUp)   AS SLAFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp,
             csla.SecondFollowUp,
             @DefaultSecondFollowUp)  AS SLASecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
        wf.CompletedOn,
        wf.UpdatedOn,
        client.OfficeLocationId,
        wf.WorkflowTypeId,
        wf.WorkflowStatusId,
        wf.LastResubmissionTAT,
        wf.LastResubmissionDate,
        wf.TAT,
        @todaysDate
    )                      AS Tat,
    wf.WorkflowStatusId,
    wf.WorkflowTypeId,
    wf.PendingActionRoleId,
 CASE 
  WHEN dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.FirstFollowUp, csla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp)
  THEN 
   CASE WHEN
    dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp, csla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) 
    THEN 'Red'
    ELSE 'Yellow'
    END
  ELSE 'Green'
 END AS SLAColor,
 CASE 
  WHEN dbo.GetLastResubmissionTat(
     wf.CompletedOn, wf.UpdatedOn, client.OfficeLocationId,
     wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId,
     wf.LastResubmissionTAT, wf.LastResubmissionDate,
     wf.TAT, @todaysDate
    ) > COALESCE(psla.SecondFollowUp, csla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
  THEN 0  
  ELSE 1
 END AS IsTransactionSLA
FROM dbo.Policy AS policy
INNER JOIN dbo.PolicyCategory      AS policyCategory
    ON policy.PolicyId = policyCategory.PolicyId
   AND policyCategory.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.MemberPolicyCategory AS memberPolicyCategory
    ON policyCategory.PolicyCategoryId = memberPolicyCategory.PolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Category            AS category
    ON policyCategory.CategoryId = category.CategoryId
   AND category.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.Member               AS member
    ON memberPolicyCategory.MemberId = member.MemberId
   AND member.IsDeleted = 0
INNER JOIN dbo.WorkflowMember    AS workflowMember
    ON memberPolicyCategory.MemberPolicyCategoryId = workflowMember.MemberPolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Workflow             AS wf
    ON workflowMember.WorkflowId = wf.WorkflowId
   AND wf.IsCompleted = 0
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA             AS psla
    ON psla.PolicyId = policy.PolicyId
   AND psla.SLAProcessTypeId = wf.WorkflowTypeId
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA            AS csla
    ON csla.CarrierId = policy.CarrierId
   AND csla.SLAProcessTypeId = wf.WorkflowTypeId
INNER JOIN dbo.Client               AS client
    ON policy.ClientId = client.ClientId
WHERE
    policy.IsDeleted = 0
    AND (
         dbo.IsBluePendingTask(wf.WorkflowTypeId, wf.WorkflowStatusId) = 1
      OR @responsibleSysRole IS NULL
      OR (
           @responsibleSysRole IS NOT NULL
       AND wf.PendingActionRoleId IS NOT NULL
       AND (
             (
               @responsibleSysRole = @HRRoleValue
           AND (wf.PendingActionRoleId = @HRRoleValue
             OR wf.PendingActionRoleId = @BrokerRoleValue)
             )
           OR wf.PendingActionRoleId = @responsibleSysRole
          )
      )
    )
	ORDER By WorkflowId;

sink.preCopyScript:
IF OBJECT_ID('dbo.TransactionSLA', 'U') IS NOT NULL
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.TransactionSLA;

source.sqlReaderQuery:
DECLARE 
    @DefaultFirstFollowUp INT = 4,
    @DefaultSecondFollowUp INT = 6,
    @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp INT = 5, 
    @TodayDate DATETIME = GETDATE();

SELECT 
    mc.MedicalClaimId,
    mc.DateReceived,
    
    COALESCE(settlpsla.FirstFollowUp, settlcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp) AS SettlementSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) AS SettlementSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.SettlementDate,
        c.ClientId 
    ) AS SettlementTat,

    COALESCE(evalpsla.FirstFollowUp, evalcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp) AS EvaluationSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(evalpsla.SecondFollowUp, evalcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp) AS EvaluationSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.EvaluationDate,
        c.ClientId
    ) AS EvaluationTat,

    COALESCE(brpsla.FirstFollowUp, brcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp) AS BrokerReviewSlaFirstFollowUp,
    COALESCE(brpsla.SecondFollowUp, brcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultBrokerReviewFollowUp) AS BrokerReviewSlaSecondFollowUp,
    dbo.GetTat(
        ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted),
        mc.BrokerReviewDate,
        c.ClientId
    ) AS BrokerReviewTat,
    ISNULL(mc.IsOriginalsAwaited, 0) AS OriginalsAwaited,
    mc.DateClosed,
    CASE
        WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.FirstFollowUp, settlcsla.FirstFollowUp, @DefaultFirstFollowUp)
        THEN CASE
            WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
                THEN 'Red'
            ELSE 'Yellow'
        END
        ELSE 'Green'
    END AS SLAColor,

    CASE
        WHEN dbo.GetTat(ISNULL(mc.ResubmissionDate, mc.DateSubmitted), mc.SettlementDate, c.ClientId) > COALESCE(settlpsla.SecondFollowUp, settlcsla.SecondFollowUp, @DefaultSecondFollowUp)
            THEN 0
        ELSE 1
    END AS IsTransactionSLA
FROM dbo.MemberPolicyCategory mpc
INNER JOIN dbo.PolicyCategory pc ON mpc.PolicyCategoryId = pc.PolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Category cat ON pc.CategoryId = cat.CategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.Policy p ON pc.PolicyId = p.PolicyId
INNER JOIN dbo.MedicalClaim mc ON mpc.MemberPolicyCategoryId = mc.MemberPolicyCategoryId
INNER JOIN dbo.WorkflowMedicalClaim wm ON mc.MedicalClaimId = wm.MedicalClaimId
INNER JOIN dbo.Carrier cr ON p.CarrierId = cr.CarrierId
INNER JOIN dbo.Client c ON p.ClientId = c.ClientId
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA settlcsla ON cr.CarrierId = settlcsla.CarrierId AND settlcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 1  -- 1 = MedicalClaimSettlementSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA settlpsla ON p.PolicyId = settlpsla.PolicyId AND settlpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 1
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA evalcsla ON cr.CarrierId = evalcsla.CarrierId AND evalcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 2  -- 2 = MedicalClaimEvaluationSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA evalpsla ON p.PolicyId = evalpsla.PolicyId AND evalpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 2
LEFT JOIN dbo.CarrierSLA brcsla ON cr.CarrierId = brcsla.CarrierId AND brcsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 3  -- 3 = MedicalClaimBrokerReviewSla
LEFT JOIN dbo.PolicySLA brpsla ON p.PolicyId = brpsla.PolicyId AND brpsla.SLAProcessTypeId = 3
LEFT JOIN Workflow w ON wm.WorkflowId = w.WorkflowId
WHERE mc.DateClosed IS NULL
AND mc.IsDeleted = 0;
